@Darktangent2:
This is a direct DVD rip. This means that, to play the files, you will need to either
1) burn the VIDEO_TS folder to a DVD and play it in a regular player, or
2) use VLC Media Player (or a similar application) to open the VIDEO_TS folder and play it as though it were a commercial DVD.

Have fun!

If you have Realplayer (if not, it's a freedownload on the net), you can actually edit videos to where you have the sound but not the video and save that as a seperate file while keeping the original video in tact. You can also convert most files in Realplayer as well. Hope that helps! ^^
It took hours to download and finding out how to  make it play was frustrating. - But it was worth it in  the end. - Thanks for sharing.
